# Mess Management Platform - Copilot Instructions

This is a Next.js mess management platform with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase authentication and database, Razorpay payments, multi-language support (English, Hindi, Marathi), role-based authentication (User, Admin), responsive design, email notifications with Resend, and WhatsApp integration.

## Project Specifications

### Roles
- **User (Mess Member)**: View menu, submit enquiry, make payments, view profile
- **Admin (Mess Owner)**: Manage users, set pricing, handle member onboarding


### Key Features
- Multi-language support (English, Hindi, Marathi)
- Razorpay payment integration
- WhatsApp + Email notifications
- Role-based authentication
- Subscription management
- Aesthetic food/mess themed design
- Mobile-first responsive design

### Tech Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 14+ with TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Database & Auth: Supabase
- Payments: Razorpay
- Notifications: Resend + WhatsApp API
- Deployment: Vercel
